attributes.action: Consider other options to tackle the assad regime in Syria.
attributes.additional_details: Please sign this petition in order to stop a coalition led invasion of Syria.
attributes.background:
The British government is currently debating whether or not military action is necessary to apprehend the Assad regime.

As seen in history the iraqi invasion resulted in the deaths of over one million people so surely there must be another peaceful option to liberate oppressed Syrian citizens.
